channel.title: [Delta 317] -- Need help asap -- [Delta 317]
channel.description: How do I change the thing where when you hover over top say the prayer staticon it sais in the top right corner "view prayer guide" I wana Make it say something else, idk if this is server or client side so I just posted here. Please Help me.

item.title: [Delta 317] -- Need help asap -- [Delta 317]
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Although im dont know how to do this since ive never tryed it before,
I would get a simple file searcher and use it to search “Prayer guide” or whatever text you want to change, make sure you use exact capitalization too, and that should tell you what file it is in, then open that file and use the ctrl f search function to find the text again and change it.

Sorry if i couldnt help but you should be able to take that and figure the rest out. Also this is client sided so make sure your doing this in the client folder

Read full topic
